name: Jing Sun 0002
content: Associate Professor Jing Sun - University of Auckland Teaching Research Interests Qualification Work Experience Professional Activities Publications Dr. Jing Sun Associate Professor School of Computer Science University of Auckland Private Bag 92019 Auckland 1142 New Zealand Email: jing.sunauckland.ac.nz Phone: +64 9 923 2286 Fax: +64 9 373 7453 Office: 903-426 (Newmarket Campus) Google Scholar, DBLP, ORCID, Scopus Teaching SOFTENG 351 / COMPSCI 351 S1 C - Fundamentals of Database Systems COMPSCI 751 S1 C - Advanced Topics in Database Systems SOFTENG 752 S2 C - Formal Specification and Design Research Interests Computer-Aided Verification, AI-Driven Automated Software Engineering Generative AI for Code Generation, LLM Applications in Cybersecurity Automated Design Model Repair, Information Security Strategies Simulation and Analysis, Model Checking, Theorem Proving Qualification Ph.D. (01/2000 - 06/2003), Department of Computer Science, School of Computing, National University of Singapore, Singapore. B.Sc. (09/1994 - 07/1998), Department of Computer Science & Technology, Nanjing University, China. Work Experience Faculty Member (08/2003 - present), School of Computer Science, University of Auckland, New Zealand. Professional Activities General Chair of 19th International Symposium on Automated Technology for Verification and Analysis (ATVA 2021), Gold Coast, Australia, 18-22 October 2021.
